events.message: I am filing a claim today after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection. The other party was at fault.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision provided.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your claim and will contact you shortly for further details.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate your cooperation during the process.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including accident photos, police report, and identification were submitted successfully today.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has officially begun as of this morning.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed with all details verified and documented.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the repair estimates and liability findings in your accident claim.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the offer presented.
Your auto accident claim has been approved; we are proceeding with the next steps for payment issuance.
The payment covering vehicle repairs has been issued and should reflect in your account within 3 business days.
Your auto accident claim case has been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
